segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, her hand outstretched towards the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, waiting for that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of her anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, so patient and trusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the boy will share the cookies with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, trying to reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's being quite brave, standing there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and drop all the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of the kids' antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a little drama unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a moment, so much happening and she's missing it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
